content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the court made a final decision on the division of matrimonial property between two parties referred to as j and b j was awarded several vehicles land with buildings a sole proprietorship farm and a private company b was awarded a vehicle an apartment and a portion of the farm the court also resolved any personal debts with creditors and ordered defendant 2 to pay €157333 in legal fees the court recognized a joint obligation between j and b to a creditor named mk j was ordered to pay b a certain amount in costs the marriage is being dissolved due to fault
